original: Atha kho bhagavā tassā rattiyā accayena bhikkhū āmantesi:
“imaṁ, bhikkhave, rattiṁ aññataro devaputto abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇo
analyzed: ▁imaṃ ▁bhikkhave ▁ratti ṃ ▁aññatar o ▁devaputt o ▁abhikkant āya ▁ratti yā ▁abhikkant avaṇṇ o

original: kevalakappaṁ jetavanaṁ obhāsetvā yenāhaṁ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā maṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhāsi.
analyzed: ▁keval a kapp aṃ ▁jetavana ṃ ▁obhās etvā ▁ye nā haṃ ▁tenupasaṃkami ▁upasaṃkamitvā ▁maṃ ▁abhivādetvā ▁ekamantaṃ ▁aṭṭhāsi

original: Ekamantaṁ ṭhito kho so devaputto maṁ gāthāhi ajjhabhāsi:
‘Samanuñño me satthā’ti maṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā tatthevantaradhāyī”ti.
analyzed: ▁samanu ññ o ▁me ▁satthā ti ▁maṃ ▁abhivādetvā ▁padakkhiṇaṃ ▁katvā ▁tattheva n tar a dhā y īti

original: Evaṁ vutte, āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
“so hi nūna so, bhante, anāthapiṇḍiko devaputto bhavissati.
Anāthapiṇḍiko, bhante, gahapati āyasmante sāriputte abhippasanno ahosī”ti.
analyzed: ▁anā th apiṇḍ iko ▁bhante ▁gahapati ▁āyasmant e ▁sār i putt e ▁abhi ppa sann o ▁ahosīti

original: Yāvatakaṁ kho, ānanda, takkāya pattabbaṁ, anuppattaṁ taṁ tayā.
Attamano āyasmā ānando bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandīti.
